description: Analyzes reported issues, identifies root causes, and applies code changes to fix bugs.

inputs.name: bug_report
inputs.description: Detailed description of the bug, including steps to reproduce and expected vs. actual behavior.

inputs.name: affected_files
inputs.description: List of potentially affected files based on initial analysis.

inputs.name: test_reproduction_script
inputs.description: Script or steps to reproduce the bug empirically.

outputs.name: fixed_files
outputs.description: List of files that were modified to fix the bug.

outputs.name: new_test_file
outputs.description: Path to a new test file that reproduces and validates the fix.
